full_text: These little Party Balloons make super party decorations, or add to bouquets for special occasions. Each balloon is a quick project for using up odds and ends of yarn. Designed by Amanda Berry @fluffandfuzz, the balloons are knitted in acrylic DK yarns on single pointed needles (not in the round). NEEDLES A pair of 2.75mm single pointed knitting needles (US 2). RECOMMENDED YARN Stylecraft Special Double Knit; double knitting/light worsted weight; 100% acrylic; a few grammes per balloon. NOTIONS Tapestry needle, toy filling, and a drinking straw or lollipop stick. SIZES One size only - approximately 6.5cm tall. TECHNIQUES For beginners and above, other techniques used include seaming, a kfb increase and k2tog decrease. PATTERN INFO This knitting pattern is a pdf download, 2 pages, and written in English. Patterns for personal use only; not for resale. Copyright © 2024 Amanda Berry; All rights reserved.
